tool_description: An API that randomly returns the legend of Takada Kenshi
name: Legend of Takada Kenshi
title: Legend of Takada Kenshi

api_list.name: Main
api_list.description:
クエリパラメータは不要です.そのままアクセスしてください.
**API認証等は特に設けておりませんが, プログラムによるAPIアクセスの場合はUser-Agentにリクエスト元のサービス名・アプリケーションを入力して下さい.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://legend-of-takada-kenshi.p.rapidapi.com/takada.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "legend-of-takada-kenshi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://legend-of-takada-kenshi.p.rapidapi.com/takada.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "legend-of-takada-kenshi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
